name: Gradescope Dark Theme
description: A simple dark theme for Gradescope
additional_info:
4/12/21 3:36PM PT
-----------
* Fixed dark red color for code to be lighter.
======

4/9/21 9:57AM PT
-----------
* Regrade requests in the submission overall view now are in dark mode.
======

8/31/20 11:45PM PT
-----------
* Fixed moss print flow.
* Fixed rubric selection items colors.
* Miscellaneous other fixes.
======

8/8/20 4:00PM PDT
-----------
* Fixed codemirror colors again.
* Miscellaneous other fixes.
======

8/2/20 10:15AM PDT
-----------
* Fixed colors for markdown code highlighting.
* Miscellaneous other fixes.
======

7/26/20 11:45AM PDT
-----------
* Fixed colors for markdown code blocks.
======

7/24/20 3:50PM PDT
-----------
* Fixed colors for codeblocks on the similarities tab.
======

7/24/20 3:20PM PDT
-----------
* Fixed colors for the adding student or CSV.
* Fixed colors on the similarities tab. Have not fixed the codeblocks as there is a code mirror theme for that.
======

7/21/20 11:05PM PDT
-----------
* Fixed colors for active vs inactive on the Review Grades page
======

7/19/20 8:05PM PDT
-----------
* Fixed colors on the landing page when not logged in.
* Fixed colors for the grouping portion of the instructor interface.
* Fixed colors in the rubric grading section of the instructor interface.
======

7/19/20 6:45PM PDT
-----------
* Fixed color for the weird white menu bar which was showing up for each link in the menu.
======

7/19/20 11:40AM PDT
-----------
* Fixed colors for online assignment checkboxes.
* Fixed color of the arrow for adding subquestions of online assignments.
======

7/19/20 11:00AM PDT
-----------
* Fixed colors for the calendar selection.
======

7/18/20
----------
+ Released the Dark Mode for Gradescope!
======
